content: capitán yarn catalina chunky alpaca 1 skein 109 yds gauge 3 5 sts and 6 rnds per inch in stockinette needle size us 10 i used a 16 addi turbo and dpns for the top notions 2 really cute buttons the ones shown were purchased at m&j trimmings here s a hat pattern that is easy to memorize and fits from a child to an adult with a big head or lots of hair knit this up in a couple of hours for a quick gift best of all it takes only one skein of a yarn that s like drugs for your fingers if you haven t knit with catalina alpaca yet you re missing out hurry up and go get some before it finishes abbreviations bobble bind off p purl c6l move next 3 stitches to a cable needle and psso pass slipped stitch over hold in front knit next 3 stitches from your pm place marker knitting needle then knit 3 from cable needle repeat repeat co cast on round - round increase increase rs right side of fabric k knit sl slip k2tog knit 2 stitches together sm slip marker kf&b knit in the front and in the back of the ssk slip 2 stitches as if to knit then knit them same stitch together through the back loop kwise knitwise st st stockinette stitch m1l make 1 stitch by picking up the right leg of sts stitches the stitch below the next stitch on the left decrease together needle and knitting into the back of it ws wrong side of fabric m1r make 1 stitch by picking up the leg of the yo yarn over bring yarn to front and wrap stitch a row below the one you just knit and around needle knitting into the back of it 2 pattern using a long-tail cast on co 74 stitches join for working in the round place marker to note the beginning of the round round 1 p2 k6 4 times p2 k5 6 times round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 p2 c6l 4 times p2 k5 6 times rnds 4 10 repeat round 1 repeat rnds 3 through 10 two more times repeat round 3 once 27 rnds completed approx 5 5 from co edge you should have 4 cables total repeat round 1 once next round remove marker from beginning of round p1 pm p1 k6 p2 k6 2 times p1 pm p1 k5 p2 k5 3 times decrease round *p1 ssk knit in pattern until 3 sts before next marker k2tog p1 sm repeat from * around repeat decrease round until 24 sts remain next round p1 ssk k2tog p1 2 times ssk k2tog 4 times 14 sts remain next round ssk k2tog 2 times sl 1 k2tog psso 2 times 6 sts remain cut yarn and pull through remaining sts secure tail inside brim after several tries i decided to go with a brim inspired by that one on the cabled
